message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CY. 

The paper deals with the task of predicting the helpfulness of answers on product-specific community question answering platforms, which involves analyzing the interactions between QA pairs and investigating the opinion coherence between the answer and crowds' opinions reflected in the reviews. This task requires natural language processing and machine learning techniques, which are commonly studied in the sub-categories of computational linguistics (cs.CL), information retrieval (cs.IR), machine learning (cs.LG), artificial intelligence (cs.AI), and computer vision and pattern recognition (cs.CY).
